channel.title: ValenceX Release
channel.description:
[center]hello i decided to realse ValenceX reason being is cause i have no hoster :/ Credits: Black Birds0 ForsakenX BrokenX original Owners : time [Used as base] [Had to fix client errors and mode some stuff]
[i]Features: Achivements: 90% Missing MageOut Achivement Pets: 100% [Pickup and drop working] Funpk: 100% [Working no lose in items] BankPinSystem [99% works and everything expect if u click no when u talk with Bank guard it doesent do anything :$] PestControl: 99% [Monsters dont Attack] In-Game-HighScores: 100% Great Shops: 100% Specials: 99% some specials are to low. GodWarsDungeon: 99% missing some npc's zoom in and out: 100% Quests: 0% [Wanted to add but i was like nahhh] ticket Exchange: 100% Dicing: 90% [Need to add threw ClanChat] Newprayers: 99% a little overpowered[/i] ---------------------------------------------------- side note: Cache isnt like hybridpvpshit and over 100mb its around 50mb- your welcome! -----------------------------------------------------
New Background [img]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/823/f715c54ba4bf4952b1db8d6.png[/img]
Changed the horried TitleBox/Buttons with new ones:
[img]http://img576.imageshack.us/img576/4324/a87fa704e8854f1db2f14b3.png[/img]
Welcome Screen
[img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/1394/5c97662df7ce48218497a5f.png[/img]
zoom in and out
[img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/1599/c187f396cd5b4dd1bc06e4a.png[/img]
highscores and yes it does save. [img]http://img803.imageshack.us/img803/4715/e4bba1a39631461cb01f586.png[/img]
Ticket Exchange: [img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/8653/91e37a40a41541839acb048.png[/img]
PetShop: [img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/6500/dcbde9d349314b2984a88ef.png[/img]
Dicing [img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/1317/841abe565c56497f9d02cec.png[/img]
icons Changed from BrokenX to new ones:
[img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/5849/83db715c18374b78a76100e.png[/img]
Achivements:
[img]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/15/adc0356da66946e19abc24e.png[/img]
BankpinSystem:
[img]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/7975/07ceb1689ea34b698929c44.png[/img]
[img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/8325/6b44f40beb27474a9ee15d1.png[/img]
[img]http://lightshot.skillbrains.com/landing/lightshot.html[/img]
Funpk:
[img]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/2058/d80465d186ad44d9b2080e2.png[/img]
newprayers [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/4119/de8bfdd4e71543c69c587ab.png[/img][/center]
Download: http://up.ht/JTRLvs

item.title: ValenceX Release

item.description:
@black_birds0 wrote:

[center]hello i decided to realse ValenceX reason being is cause i have no hoster
Credits:
Black Birds0
ForsakenX
BrokenX original Owners : time [Used as base] [Had to fix client errors and mode some stuff]

Features:
Achivements: 90% Missing MageOut Achivement
Pets: 100% [Pickup and drop working]
Funpk: 100% [Working no lose in items]
BankPinSystem [99% works and everything expect if u click no when u talk with Bank guard it doesent do anything :$]
PestControl: 99% [Monsters dont Attack]
In-Game-HighScores: 100%
Great Shops: 100%
Specials: 99% some specials are to low.
GodWarsDungeon: 99% missing some npc’s
zoom in and out: 100%
Quests: 0% [Wanted to add but i was like nahhh]
ticket Exchange: 100%
Dicing: 90% [Need to add threw ClanChat]
Newprayers: 99% a little overpowered

side note:
Cache isnt like hybridpvpshit and over 100mb
its around 50mb- your welcome!

New Background

Changed the horried TitleBox/Buttons with new ones:

zoom in and out

highscores and yes it does save.
